name: Casa Valentina Hanoi Hotel
address: 49 Phố Hàng Gà, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
description:
Với khu vườn, phòng chờ chung và sân hiên, Casa Valentina Hanoi Hotel tọa lạc ở trung tâm Hà Nội, cách Ô Quan Chưởng 8 phút đi bộ. Ngoài Wi-Fi miễn phí, khách sạn 4 sao này còn cung cấp dịch vụ phòng và quầy lễ tân 24 giờ. Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp máy ATM, dịch vụ tiền sảnh và dịch vụ thu đổi ngoại tệ cho khách.

Khách sạn cung cấp cho khách các phòng có điều hòa, bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, tủ lạnh, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen. Tại Casa Valentina Hanoi Hotel, mỗi phòng đều được thiết kế có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng hằng ngày, gồm các lựa chọn thực đơn buffet, thực đơn à la carte và kiểu Mỹ.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Nhà hát múa rối Thăng Long, Hồ Hoàn Kiếm và Hoàng thành Huế. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Nội Bài, cách Casa Valentina Hanoi Hotel 24 km.

review.comment_positive: I liked everything. The staff were super friendly and helpful and the location was excellent.

The location is great, everything is brand new, and the staff Jonathan & Liam are absolutely fantastic and a credit to the company they both go above and beyond to be helpful and accommodate anything needed would 100% recommend and if I go back to Hanoi I will def be staying there again. Thanks Olly

review.rating: Perfect for a short stay in Hanoi. Very welcoming and froendly hosts. Will come again
review.comment_positive: Very clean hotel in central location. Very handy for all the sights. John and William are very helpful and gave me some great advice for my first time in Hanoi. Breakfast was included. Minibar in the room. Very good

review.rating: Great location and siper friendly staff
review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Great location, and the rooms are very clean and spacious. The staff, notably Mr John and Mr William, were fantastic- so helpful with things to do and see as well as organising medical help when needed.
review.comment_negative: Little bit noisy as we had a front room that faced the road.

review.comment_positive:
Located in the Old quarter and minutes away from eateries, coffee shops etc.
Large comfy beds and rooms were of good size, really friendly and helpful staff with the front desk being very knowledgeable of Hanoi, special thanks to Annie who helped us arrange our activities in Hanoi.  Would come back when we are next back in Hanoi.

A petit, comfortable hotel conveniently located in the Old Town, with very helpful, friendly staff. The room is clean, simple, nicely decorated, and more spacious than similar hotels in the old town. The hotel is still new, so the furnishings are new and comfortable.
The bathroom was also clean, but I had a problem with hot water on the first day. However, when I called the receptionist, a very nice person named Liam was quick to help me. It was already around 10 pm, but he called an engineer and fixed it for me. Since the hotel was full that day, I could not move to another room and had to wait for the repairs to be completed, which did not take long. The showers in the other rooms didn't seem to have any problems, it just happened to be the shower in the room I stayed in. Liam said he was sorry and offered various compensation. He also arranged a cab to the airport on my return at a lower price than the market rate. 
Breakfast was delicious with different choices. Their Vietnamese noodle was very good.
I have stayed at many different small hotels in the old town of Hanoi, and this hotel is my best. I'll stay at this hotel again when I come back to Hanoi next time.

review.rating: Hotel in the centre of Hanoi. The great location, comfortable rooms and excellent service will ensure you an unforgettab
review.comment_positive: Perfect location, great&kind&helpful staff, very nice rooms and perfect breakfasts

Lovely property, highly recommend to anyone coming to Hanoi.  It’s a new hotel so the facilities are very clean and in new condition. The staff are super friendly, you feel very welcome at the property. Any questions or issues you can easily contact via WhatsApp. They also provide information about things to see and do, they also can help you book tours. Delicious breakfast with lots of options and hot food such as soup and eggs can be ordered. Was only going to stay one night but enjoyed it so much I have extended to 3 nights.
Great central location, great breakfast, very comfortable rooms and very friendly staff. Good price too

review.rating: Kudos to Casa Valentina Hanoi Team.
review.comment_positive: New hotel in a great location. The staff were very friendly and assist me with my trip to Halong Bay. They also booked me a limousine bus ticket to Ninhbinh. Impressive!
I liked everything. The staff were super friendly and helpful and the location was excellent.

The location is great, everything is brand new, and the staff Jonathan & Liam are absolutely fantastic and a credit to the company they both go above and beyond to be helpful and accommodate anything needed would 100% recommend and if I go back to Hanoi I will def be staying there again. Thanks Olly
